fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Single market, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: c/o BDO LLP 4 Atlantic Quay 70 York Street
eu_initiatives: Financial services policy including Markets in Financial Instruments Directive, European Market Infrastructure Regulation, Capital Markets Union, ESAs, Capital requirements regulation/ directives, cumulative impact of financial regulation, fintech
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: Regular workshops on financial services issues; occasional working dinners featuring guest speakers
goals__remit: The Financial Future is an independent, not-for-profit membership-based discussion platform that hosts 9-10 workshops and other ad hoc events each year in Brussels on EU financial services issues and legislative proposals. Our meetings bring together a range of speakers from the EU institutions, industry and non-governmental organisations to facilitate a constructive dialogue on the regulation of the financial sector. The Financial Future does not do any lobbying or take positions on any of the issues it discusses.
